channel.title: Hyperion #459 || World PvP || Earning Potential System || KillStreak System
channel.description:
[center]Personally think its a decent worldwide PvP server, since I haven't seen any other ones released with the same features (for hyperion)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wTF66Pr.png[/img]
[B]Features[/B] Stable - 100 on tested on 512MB RAM, no lag 80% special attacks 90% melee combat 80% ranged combat 60% Mage Combat 5% Shops EP System - More of a base - BASED on your RISK Killstreak System - more of a base Checks if you killed the same person twice Selling and buying items via command for shop price Kills/Death recorded + KDR PkPoints Ring of recoil Vengeance
[spoiler] [img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/619/bd1d.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7qmWTG6.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/9Ir81ia.png[/img]
[img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/9332/mdu8.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/k7y3D7X.png[/img]
[img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/893/e29q.png[/img]
[img]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/5642/q5j.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FaIkFTv.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/nHSRnKh.png[/img]
[img]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/6022/qz42.png[/img]
[img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/5656/wp.png[/img]
[img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/5771/pvsu.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CCyAsdo.png[/img]
[img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/6084/9q6g.png[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mkep1mTA5xI&feature=youtu.be [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Download Links] [url=http://goo.gl/hKCkxN]InfernoPvP Server[/url] [url=http://goo.gl/S3moYP]459 Client[/url] [url=http://goo.gl/vhnXko]InfernoPvP CLIENT + SERVER Package - Uppit[/url] [/spoiler]
[COLOR="#FF0000"]WARNING : Some things I probably overlooked, I have only been working on this for a short time[/COLOR]
ANY Questions or complaints, feel free to private message me :D
Feel free to leave any comment[/center]

item.title: Hyperion #459 || World PvP || Earning Potential System || KillStreak System
item.dc:creator: @thebst thebst
item.description:
@thebst wrote:

manteliakas:

where is the compile and run in this cliuent?..

You can make your own compile & run, remember to add libraries. Same w/IDEs, if it doesn’t automatically build the libs in the build path, just add them manually.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion #459 || World PvP || Earning Potential System || KillStreak System
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:22, topic:531178”]I try to run your server and this happens: does this happen to you?

WARNING: Failed to load the shops for some reason, check the data dir for shops.xmlcom.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: Cannot construct org.hyperion.rs2.content.Shop as it does not have a no-args constructor : Cannot construct org.hyperion.rs2.content.Shop as it does not have a no-args constructor
---- Debugging information ----
message : Cannot construct org.hyperion.rs2.content.Shop as it does not have a no-args constructor
cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAccessException
cause-message : Cannot construct org.hyperion.rs2.content.Shop as it does not have a no-args constructor
class : java.util.ArrayList
required-type : org.hyperion.rs2.content.Shop
path : /list/shop
line number : 2

Sep 29, 2013 4:59:05 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDropController init
INFO: Loaded 950 npc drops.
Sep 29, 2013 4:59:05 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCSpawn init
INFO: Loading NPC spawns…
Sep 29, 2013 4:59:05 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCSpawn init
INFO: Loaded 1530 NPC spawns.
java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “.DS_Store”[/quote]
Either update your XStream or add the no-arg constructor in Shop class.

Read full topic
